If you are good to control your greed towards iPhone 7, this is the best phone to have.

title: My Experience
review:
Update after Seven days of Usage: 
-Received in a good package
-The manufacturing date was recent . 
- The phone is Good, No issues with it. 
- battery life can be Compared to Androids 3300 mAh battery phones
-A beast in terms of performance.
- I would not say anything super exciting but Good Camera Performance. The camera has an awesome shutter speed which is good for clicking pics of Notes very fast.. lol, thus it servers my Purpose 
- Excellent Voice assistant Siri.
Cons 
- Not recommended for Heavy Multimedia lovers, they can Go for for 6s plus, as 6s screen is a bit small. 
- Certain small tweaks are absent which were important. For eg Call recording and Vibration alert when the call is connected so u have to stick it to your ears.
-No fast charging.
-Can't access all the files.
As an Android user I could store any type of file on my phone. .rar .zip .exe any format of file could me stored and accessed when ever needed. 
But on an I phone u can Store and Access only Pics Mp3s Videos Pdfs and other .doc files. Other than that u can't access all other file types from files from a file manger. 
- Has an Higher level of SAR as compared to other smart phones.

title: Great product
review:
I was a bit skeptical before ordering an iphone online because i have seen many negative reviews about people getting damaged products or fake products. So i sent a mail as a pre-order enquiry to Flipkart. They have assured me that i will be receiving a genuine product. So i just ordered an iphone 6s 32gb and i received it today. I request buyers to make a video while unboxing the product so that they would have a proof if the product turns out to be fake. I got an original product from Flipkart and im thankful to them for that and for making it available at such a low price compared to retail market.

Now coming to the phone itself, what can i say.... its an iphone after all l. No company can match apple's build quality and after sales support.
Everything is great about this mini beast. The one thing that attracted me towards this phone is its form factor. It feels great in hand.
Camera is great.... ram management is superb..... display is comparable to other Android flagships but will not match amoled screens..... the storage u get out of the box is around 22gb so keep that in mind.... havent installed any high end games yet but im sure that it can run any game smoothly as i have seen in all the reviews.
Switching from Android to ios is a bit of a hassle. I have been an Android user for the past 4 years and i think that if u want ios like optimization then only Google's nexus and currently pixel devices offer that. But i didnt get a pixel because the after sales service is poor. Hopefully the next pixel comes with collaboration of LG rather than HTC.

In this price range there are only 2 good devices and they are oneplus 5 and iphone 6s.
If u want a larger screen then go for oneplus5 or else i would recommend iphone 6s... it is a great device overall and im loving every bit of using it.

Just go for it u won't regret ur choice!!!

title: iPhone 6s 32
review: Product is awesome!! But if u hv more money then go for 64 gb

title: One Word Awesomeness
review:
One word Awesomeness at the peak.Genuine review after using 5 days.

As I am a hardcore Android user , senior member in xda,iPhone rocks over Android.No lagging at all while my Nexus 6 worked like a hell even in 3GB ram.
Got the iOS 10.2 update and phone runs buttersmooth.Installed 50 heavy apps and run all and all runs smoothly even Asphalt 8 and moder combat runs simultaneously without any problems.

But little bit restrictions are there but I am happy with iPhone

title: Iphone 6s review
review: I bought Iphone 6s 32GB from flipkart, This is first time I'm purchasing a product online, I was little scared if i will receive a duplicate product. I was very happy to see that i received a genuine product. Thanks to Flipkart for ensuring the product delivered is genuine. I have been using it for 15days now. I'm very happy with the quality of the product.

title: Worth it
review:
Was very afraid to buy online , cuz iphones are on the top to be decocted ( jhol ). Many sellers send used , clones , copy , or change accessories from the box. 
But cause it was flipkart and as per my experience i trusted it . And yes it was all worth it . 
Dont worry for frauds , the delivery guy was too very friendly and co-operative, i asked him to pay after i open and check the product , he denied but said rather u can just shoot a video for ur assurance and as a proof and if anything goes wrong ill stand besides you. 
Luckily evrything was fine the product and accessories were 101% genuine . 
Packing was good , its been months and still no heating issue no battery prblm no screen/display issue , speaker and evrythng works as good as it should. Very happy with Apple and Flipkart . 
Go for it . 

About the product : 

If u are looking for an upgrade from iphone 5s or 6 
This is the phone for u 
Its almost close to iphone 7 
Dont go for iphone 7 rather save money and buy 6s its worth it 
2 Gb ram in an iphone is like 6 GB ram in android. 
Iphone 7 and iphone 6s specs are almost same . 
Camera quality is just upto the mark 
Clicking pictures in 12mp was never so better. Gives so rich look to ur pictures 
4K video recording is also good 
Only thing that lacks is optimal image stablization. 
So if u are running while recording a video it may not be stable and may give u blurr or low iso pictures ! 
But anyone who is confused between buying an iphone 6s what are u waiting for ? 
Go for it . 
Best phone u can have even after its 3 years of releasing.

title: Works like a charm :)
review:
Well After reading many negative and positive reviews I finally decided to buy this phone.
Got this phone for 32000k from the sale
Was bit worried about receiving defective phone instead 
But using it for more than 3 days and working fine till now :)
Just go for it 
Or wait for any sale to come..
No heating issues
Battery is decent as it last a full day in light usage 
And 4 to 5 hours in heavy usage

Few things should kept in mind while buying this product from online
After product gets deliver make a video of unboxing and check almost everything like speakers, mic, accessories etc etc
This can be kept as proof if any defective product is being delivered

For me it was excellent 
The delivery timing was good got this in a day
Packaging was also good

And iphone is an iphone

title: Still one of the greatest phone by Apple.
review:
First of all, great service by Flipkart for delivering it in just one day. Well the iphone 6s is a remarkable smartphone by apple. Was introduced in 2015 but still outperforms many flagships of this year too.
Now coming to Pros:
1. Performance: No lag at all. Use any application and it just flows easily.
2. IOS: Sweet, simple and intuitive. Great animations and great user interface.
3. Camera: Iphone is still one of the fastest pic capturing camera in any light. Flawless pics in any light source.

Now coming to some cons:
1. Less functionalities: IOS has some user restrictions like no external downloading from internet. Still some apps can be used. Music can be downloaded via wynk music or savnn but can't be just added from computer. You got to use itunes for that which is a bit lenghty process.
2.Battery: Some might say battery life of iphone is very less but for my use it is just enough for the day.
3.Other features like Dual sim and microsd slot are missing.
Overall a great phone to buy if you have to use for a year or more and you are ok with one sim only.

title: Bad experience with the Vendor and Delivery partner
review:
Today i Have cancelled the order because while our honorable Prime Minister is promoting and empowering Digital India, Flipkart is entertaining Delivery partners who doesn't even have card swipe machine. 
Its true that i ordered cash on delivery , but as the amount was 34k, I had expected that these people will have card machine. The card on delivery option is not present .
Secondly none of the customer care executive including floor supervisor helped me in any way , rather talked in an bad manner . I thought it would be good experience to  buy but was proved wrong . Thanks Flipkart for not helping

Don't buy from Supercom seller or if your delivery partner is Ecom , only buy if its WS retail.

title: Great phone
review: I had ordered the product on 1st june and recieved it on 3rd june. Must say loving it didn't want to bet that amount of money on Samsung or alternatives. Build quality is amazing . Battery Lasts me easily throughout the day and camera is the best you get in this range. A must buy at this price

title: Average Phone with hang issue on high price..
review:
Hallo All, I have bought this phone from Flipkart with a big hope and making a royal image that I am buying Apple IPhone 6s. I am a first user. Delivery from Flipkart is good. Few points I want to clear here -

1. Battery back is average. Not good. It's 1750mah battery.

2. I am feeling now that my phone is being hang some times after 15 days use. Going to Apple service care to meet them.

3. It's head phone is malfunctioning some time. Have to visit for that also.

4. Being a first user of IPhone, was having a big brand and quality image. But this is average, some time I feel that I have spent much more for apple, I can buy some other good Android phones in half of its current price.

5. Some software issue also, about transfering the pics from IPhone to my laptop.

Summary - average phone with a big brand name.

I am so happy.....
Thanks flipkart team.

title: Amazing product
review:
I was a bit apprehensive about getting a phone online as I have many stories of damaged products being delivered. It turned out that there was no reason to be doubtful and delivery was very quick and reliable. 

About the phone:
The processor is good, the phone is fast, can operate efficiently with multiple tabs open and the camera is excellent. I was an avid Android user till then but switching to iOS was very simple and GUI is amazing.
I would recommend getting it with higher memory though as 32GB is just not sufficient.
